DOC.brief_summary: This study test website teen design help improve diet physical activity . The website several component : educational message , role model story , goal setting , self-monitoring form , problem solving , monitor discussion forum , diet physical activity ( PA ) assessment questionnaire .
DOC.brief_title: An Interactive Web-Based Program Improve Food Activity Choices Teens
DOC.detailed_description: Increasing number youth risk become overweight poor diet low physical activity level . Prevention key reduce obesity problem . Intervention program must easily accessible , include intervention material format draws attention interest . This study evaluate 8-week web-based intervention teen promote healthy food physical activity choice . The web program include role model story , nutrition activity information piece , goal set problem solving , self-monitoring . Students complete assessment baseline , 8-weeks post , 6 12-months post intervention .
DOC.criteria: ability speak English 1217 year old special diet
